index.name: vim
index.subtitle: Vim
index.about: Vim is a highly configurable text editor built to enable efficient text editing. It is an improved version of the vi editor distributed with most UNIX systems.
index.description: Read good ebooks about VIM only here and for free!

books.title: Vim para Noobs
books.description: A free GitBook about Vim editor for Noobs become text hackers.
books.author: William Oliveira

books.title: Learn Vimscript the Hard Way
books.description: Learn Vimscript the Hard Way is a book for users of the Vim editor who want to learn how to customize Vim.
books.author: Steve Losh

books.title: The Vim Tutorial and Reference
books.description: A complete ebook about Vim Tutorial and Vim References.
books.author: Steve Oualline
